description: National Railcard discounts on Tube, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail services

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Your National Railcard gives you discounts on the Tube, DLR, London Overground, TfL Rail and National Rail services."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"image","link":{"image":{}},"image":{"url":"https://tfl.gov.uk/cdn/static/cms/images/national-railcard.png","alt":"National Railcard"},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"National Railcards"}
There are different Railcards available to suit your age and needs.Â You need to register your Oyster card if you're adding a discount to it and want to apply for refunds or replacements.
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"16-25 Railcard"}
Get 1/3 discount on off-peak pay as you go travel. Add your discount to an Oyster card or 18+ Student Oyster photocard .
You can also buy discounted Off-Peak Day Travelcards to travel:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["At any time on weekends and public holidays","After 09:30 Monday to Friday, during July or August, or after 10:00, Monday to Friday for the rest of the year"]}
Apply for a 16-25 Railcard
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"26-30 Railcard"}
Get 1/3 discount on off-peak pay as you go travel. Add your discount to an Oyster card or 18+ Student Oyster photocard .
You can also buy discounted Off-Peak Day Travelcards to travel:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["At any time on weekends and public holidays","After 10:00, Monday to Friday"]}
Apply for a 26-30 Railcard
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Senior Railcard"}
If you're 60 or over, you can get 1/3 discount on off-peak pay as you go travel. Add your discount to an Oyster card.
You can also buy discounted Off-Peak Day Travelcards to travel:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["At any time on weekends and public holidays","After 09:30, Monday to Friday"]}
Apply for a Senior Railcard
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"HM Forces Railcard"}
Get 1/3 discount on off-peak pay as you go travel. Add your discount to an Oyster card.
You can also buy discounted Off-Peak Day Travelcards for yourself and up to four children aged between 5 and 15, travelling with you. You can travel:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["At any time on weekends and public holidays","After 09:30, Monday to Friday during July and August, or after 10:00, Monday to Friday for the rest of the year"]}
Apply for an HM Forces Railcard
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Disabled Persons Railcard"}
Get 1/3 discount on:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Pay as you go travel","Off-Peak Day Travelcard for you or someone aged over 16 travelling with you"]}
Add your discount to an Oyster card.
With an Off-Peak Day Travelcard, you can travel:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["At any time on weekends and public holidays","After 09:30, Monday to Friday"]}
If you use a Disabled Person's Freedom Pass to travel, you can't use your Disabled Persons Railcard to buy a discounted ticket for someone else.
Apply for a Disabled Persons Railcard
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Network Railcard"}
Get 1/3 discount on off-peak rail travel in London and the South East. You can buy discounted Off-Peak Day Travelcards to travel anytime on weekends and public holidays for yourself, and:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Up to three adults aged 16 or over","Up to four children aged between 5 and 15"]}
They must be travelling with you.
If your annual Travelcard covers the same zones as a discounted Day Travelcard, you can travel after 10:00, Monday to Friday, and buy discounted Off-Peak Day Travelcards, for:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Up to four children aged between 5 and 15"]}
You can't add this discount to an Oyster card.
Apply for Network Railcard
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Family \u0026 Friends Railcard"}
Get 1/3 discount on Off-Peak Day Travelcards for yourself and:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Up to three adults aged 16 or over","Up to four children aged between 5 and 15"]}
They must always travel with you.
You can travel anytime on weekends and public holidays.
If two adults each have a Family & Friends Railcard, you can get discounted travel for:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Up to two adults aged 16 or over","Up to four children aged between 5 and 15"]}
They must always travel with you.
You can't add this discount to an Oyster card.
Apply for a Family & Friends Railcard
{"template":"htag","level":"h4","value":"Two Together Railcard"}
Get 1/3 discount on Off-Peak Day Travelcards for you and another named person, to travel:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["At any time on weekends and public holidays","After 09:30, Monday to Friday"]}
You can't add this discount to an Oyster card.
Apply for a Two Together Railcard
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Add your discount to your Oyster card"}
A member of staff can add your Railcard discount at:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Tube, London Overground and TfL Rail stations"," \u003ca href=\"http://www.nationalrail.co.uk/stations_destinations/\"\u003eSome National Rail ticket offices\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"https://tfl.gov.uk/maps/oyster-ticket-stops\"\u003eOyster Ticket Stops\u003c/a\u003e "," \u003ca href=\"/travel-information/visiting-london/getting-around-london/visitor-centres\"\u003eVisitor Centres\u003c/a\u003e "]}
You'll need to show your National Railcard.
When you renew your National Railcard, you'll need to add the discount on your Oyster card again.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"How to use"}
Carry your National Railcard with you at all times and don't let anyone else use it.
